pullrequest.title: Expanding the functionality of the plugin framework, and introducing PluginPtr and specializations

content.raw:
Whoops, thanks; I looked right past those somehow. (Although some of them are new thanks to my last commit and my propensity for non-compliance with cpp-check)

The third complaint is really cramping my artistic spirit, but I'll make the change anyhow.

Fixed by 56a7e5f (hopefully)
